general_advisory: General advisory about weather and cropping: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. In these stages, water scarcity or deficit of water causes a comparatively greater reduction in yields. Hence, water deficit during these stages should be avoided.

Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect the crop from water scarcity during summer.
Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Conserve up to 50% water by irrigating alternate rows.
The high temperature increases the water requirement of the maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field.

The high temperature increases the water requirement of the maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage during irrigation in sandy and loamy soil.
High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato and brinjal. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10-liter water in the root zone.
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8 m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if the water temperature rises to 30 0C. Ensure enough water depth before introducing fingerlings in a pond.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.

Whitefly Infestation: To prevent whitefly infestation in okra seeds should be treated with Imidacloprid @ 7-gram/kg of seeds before sowing. Install 8-10 nos of yellow sticky traps starting from 2-3 leaf stage of the crop.

After harvesting of onion, cut the tops leaving 2.0 -2.5 cm above bulb. The harvested bulb should be dried in a well-ventilated concrete floored room. Well-dried bulbs can be stored for a longer period.

To control mango hoppers spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 5 ml/15 liters of water or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 3ml/15litre of water or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 4g / 15litre of water. Application of smoke below the plants can also help in reducing the pest population.
